tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: An amazing teacher! You will pass the class if you pay attention and look over your notes. Not many quizzes , but when there is theyre worth a lot. He has such a positive attitude and great energy in class. Would definitely take him again.

comments: Mr. Graciano is an incredible instructor! As a retired narcotics detective, he brings a very unique viewpoint to the classroom. He has an effective way of keeping the class entertained with lighthearted jokes while serving the class with tons of information. He\'s a tough grader because he has high expectations of this students.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: GRACIANO: The epitome of a great professor! He keeps you interested throughout the whole semester. Great lectures with a lot of useful & interesting information. Graciano is a brilliant man that is extremely approachable & knowledgeable! Luv him

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  CARING  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: A very fair, straightforward and caring teacher who really understands the topic. He used to be a narcotics officer at LAPD, so if you\'re interested in criminal justice or law enforcement, he is the guy to take. Sprinkles in some great jokes too. Attendance and being on time is key. Respect is important in his class. Good guy.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Caring (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Great professor! Inspired many students, like myself, to become police officers. He made us all feel welcomed. Taught very well. Attendance is mandatory and tardiness was not accepted. If I could have him again, I definitely would!

comments: This guy is a current LAPD Officer and it shows in his attitude. He needs to develop a more mature approach in his teaching skills and leave the \'cop\' attitude in the parking lot.

comments: HE IS VERY STRICT ABOUT ATENDANCE AND BEEN ON TIME TO CLASS. HE IS VERY NICE AND HIS ASSIGNMENTS AND TEST ARE EASY. HE IS A GOOD PROFESSOR, THAT CARES ABOUT HIS STUDENTS. HE IS FAIR IN GRADING.

He gives extra credit when necessary, very helpful, patient, fun, and he is very clear on what he expects from you. Take him!! Won
